abstract: The proxy contains a clawback provision with some bite. Intel can take back money it turns out an executive didn’t deserve.
snippet: The proxy contains a clawback provision with some bite. Intel can take back money it turns out an executive didn’t deserve.
lead_paragraph: More companies are instituting policies that appear to help them recover incentive pay if they have to restate their financial results and it turns out that executives did not deserve the extra pay. But compensation experts warn that not all of these provisions have teeth.

headline.main: Intel Can Recover Bonuses It Shouldn’t Have Paid
